page.title: 07A Home as a Guest House
page.content: My house becomes a guest house for four months of the year.It has six bedrooms and we can cater for fifteen paying guests at any one time.I help in the summer by laying tables in the dining room,serving meals,washing pots and making beds.The busy time is on a Saturday morning when the old guests leave and new ones arrive.All the rooms have to be cleaned,the beds changed and the laundry dealt with.Mum has also to organise the shopping for the following week.I like the Summer because I enjoy meeting new people and the atmosphere is always happy. In the winter my house becomes my home again.My family and I settle down to a more usual routine and prepare for winter and the Christmas season.
